p: Superoxide anion content was determined using the nitro blue tetrazolium (NBT), as described by Green and Hill [ 29]. The reaction mixture was prepared by adding 0.5 mL of aphid homogenate to 0.5 mL NBT in 0.2 M phosphate buffer pH 7.8. The changes in absorbance were measured against the blank samples (without NBT) at a wavelength of 490 nm. The reduced activity of NBT by the aphid homogenates was expressed as ΔA 490 × min −1 × mg −1 of protein.
